Chapter 2 Data preperation We can enter CSV data in R using read.csv function or read_csv function from readr package. However, for now we will use data that already exist in the datasets packages that we downloaded Lets load the library ‘datsets’ library(datasets) Lets look at the chickeweight data head(ChickWeight) ## weight Time Chick Diet ## 1 42 0 1 1 ## 2 51 2 1 1 ## 3 59 4 1 1 ## 4 64 6 1 1 ## 5 76 8 1 1 ## 6 93 10 1 1
